about_the_game:
Bullet Hell x Rogue-like!
"Hello, Lucia" is a game that mixes bullet hell shooter with rogue-like elements.
Collect relics to strengthen your ship and break through randomly generated stages!

■ Stages that change each time you play

The stage consists of several floors, and you can choose your favorite floor to proceed.
Earn relics by defeating enemies, take a break to recover damage taken, and collect stars to purchase items.
Also, the stages are randomly generated each time you play, so you can enjoy different developments each time.

■ Pop and casual, but full-fledged bullet hell

It looks cute, but the bullet hell is authentic. They hunt down Lucia and the player with various attacks.
But don't worry. Powerful power-ups and bombs are prepared. Beginners can enjoy it with peace of mind.
For advanced players, we have prepared a mode where you can feel a harder response.
We aimed to create a game that everyone can enjoy, from beginners to advanced players.

■ Collect relics to strengthen your ship
By collecting relics that can be obtained in the middle of the stage, you can enhance the performance of your ship.
You can increase your firepower with missiles and lasers, or you can increase your defense by strengthening your HP and armor.
Collect your favorite relics and defeat enemies.

■ Accommodates achievements and leaderboards
Compete with players from all over the world and aim for a higher rank!
It also supports achievement function. Various achievements are available.
